description: Reach for the stars (or just your next puzzle piece) as you create this celestial map featuring the Zodiac in our captivating “Constellations” puzzle! As you connect the pieces of this brightly illustrated puzzle, think about how ancient civilizations connected the dots in the night sky! Constellations are groups of stars that form a pattern or picture, like Leo the Lion, Orion the Great Hunter, and Scorpius the Scorpion. From the Ancient Greeks to the Native Americans, cultures around the world have identified stars as gods, goddesses, animals and other objects. Why not count how many constellations you recognize as you puzzle them out today! Did you know The Big Dipper is not a constellation? It is actually called an asterism; a recognized but not official grouping of stars. It’s part of the constellation Ursa Major, the Greater Bear. This 2,000-piece jigsaw puzzle combines captivating imagery with clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience! Our puzzles are crafted with an exclusive, extra-thick cardboard backing along with our superior, linen-structured paper, so the printed image is vibrant, crisp, and glare-free. Create memorable moments with Ravensburger premium puzzles! Fun for ages 14 and up! Measures approximately 38.5 x 29.5 inches (98 x 75 cm) when completed.
